title: How does the browser communicate to the server what is the preferred language of the user?

choices.a: User language preferences are sent using the Accept-Language header
choices.b: The main language is sent using the Locale header, while secondary languages are usually included in the X-Locale-Alternate header.
choices.c: The browser doesn’t communicate the language of the user, it’s inferred from the user IP.
choices.d: The main language is included in the User-Agent header

answers: User language preferences are sent using the Accept-Language header
